content.query:
CREATE SCHEMA NYCTaxi

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE NYCTaxi.passengercount
WITH 
(
    LOCATION='azuresynapsedev1/NYCTaxi/avgdata/',
    DATA_SOURCE=demodatasource,
    FILE_FORMAT=PARQUET
)
AS
      SELECT PassengerCount,
      SUM(TripDistanceMiles) as SumTripDistance,
      AVG(TripDistanceMiles) as AvgTripDistance
      FROM
       OPENROWSET (
           BULK 'https://azuredatalakegen2dev.dfs.core.windows.net/preparezone/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
           FORMAT ='PARQUET'
       )
       AS [rows]
       WHERE TripDistanceMiles > 0 AND PassengerCount > 0
       GROUP BY PassengerCount
       ORDER BY PassengerCount
    GO
